author: Luis Cruz
subject: Re: Looking for this Lupin LaserDisc...
body:
> Does anyone on this list have this LD:
> "Lupin the Third: The Castle of Caliostro [Eigoban]"
> (Eigoban="English Version")? It was released in Japan
> by Toho years ago, the disc's content includes the

Digital Discs has it listed under their special order
page http://www.digitaldiscsanime.com/LDAnimeorder.html

Give them a go.  Good luck!
